text: (ye vah vakt tha) jab tum (maidaane jang mein madeene ke) qareeb naake par the aur vah kuphfaar baeed (door ke) ke naake par aur (kaafile ke) savaar tum se nasheb mein the aur agar tum ek doosare se (vakt qee taqareer ka) vaayada kar lete ho to aur vakt par gadabad kar dete magar (khuda ne achaanak tum logon ko ikattha kar diya taaki jo baat yadanee (honee) thee vah pooree kar dikhae taaki jo shakhs halaak (gumaraah) ho vah (haq kee) hujjat tamaam hone ke baad halaak ho aur jo zinda rahe vah hidaayat kee hujjat tamaam hone ke baad zinda rahe aur khuda yaqeenee sunane vaala khabaradaar hai
